tasks.task: Determine whether to purchase flow control valves for sprinkler systems.
subtasks: Investigate the need for flow control valves in your sprinkler setup.
Understand the water pressure requirements for pop-up spray heads and rotors.
Recognize the issue of misting when 50 psi reaches spray heads.
Learn how flow control valves can provide proper water pressure to all sprinklers.
Consider purchasing flow control valves from Sprinkler Warehouse.
Check for more detailed videos on controlling water pressure and using flow control valves.
